unnormalised: Hey, interesting article on training! Made me think of my coach, Dr. Sharma, pushing us hard back in Delhi. Remember those 5 km runs near India Gate? Brutal! Rs. 50 for chai after felt like heaven. We did a lot of plyometrics in a small 200 sq ft space. Stamina training reminded me of a marathon. Do you think focusing on core strength, like wrestlers in Haryana, is good?
normalised: Hey, interesting article on training! Made me think of my coach, Doctor Sharma, pushing us hard back in Delhi. Remember those five kilometer runs near India Gate? Brutal! Rupee fifty for chai after felt like heaven. We did a lot of plyometrics in a small two hundred square feet space. Stamina training reminded me of a marathon. Do you think focusing on core strength, like wrestlers in Haryana, is good?
